title: The Tricksters
description: The lives of Jack and Naomi Hamilton, their five children, their guest, and friends are disturbed by the arrival of three mysterious and sinister young men at Carnival's Hide, the Hamilton's seaside home in New Zealand, and by bizarre supernatural events. author: Margaret Mahy
